errors.invalid_credentials: Your email address or password is incorrect
errors.account_pending: Your account request is pending approval. You will be unable to sign in until your account request is approved
errors.account_locked: Your account has been locked due to too many failed login attempts
errors.account_disabled: Your account has been disabled. Contact the administrator
errors.concurrent_session: Your login credentials were used in another browser. Please sign in again
errors.session_timeout: Your session has expired. Please sign in again to continue
errors.token_expired: Your authentication has expired. Please sign in again
errors.token_invalid: Invalid authentication token. Please sign in again

warnings.last_attempt_warning: You have one more attempt before your account is locked

support.contact: Contact the Defra IT Service Desk on 0800 8766458 or email pafs-support@environment-agency.gov.uk
support.unlock_account: You can use forgot password to unlock your account

service_error: There was a problem signing in. Please try again
